work-item.field:
Lets ask ourself if we are able to write our own reports after this training.
  • Create a boolean page parameter "answer"
  • Create a parameter form
  • Add a HTML table with 2 columns
    • First column should contain "Are we able to script our own reports after training?"
    • Second column should check if "answer" is true or false.
      • If it is true "Good Job!" should be displayed
      • If it is false "Oh no :(" should be displayed
Example Image:
